subject: RS 469 direct to recorder
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
I am posting two short sessions for hopefully others to comment on.  
This is completed with a RS 469 going directly into my handheld digital 
recorder.  Coincidentally, I am outside in a light rain so maybe it is 
ideal for me here in Mexico where I get few signals.

At first I thought I heard the word BUENO (hello in Spanish) but I now 
hear DINO with is my wife's name...short for Dinorah.  She is normally 
not with me for sessions and was not with me for this session so I 
doubt what I am hearing.  Any comments would be appreciated.  

The other recording I hear the name HELEN.  I don't know anyone with 
that name.  Ron L
